headline: STZ has 'too many external headwinds,' SAM has 'clearer path' to topline growth
summary: Investing.com -- Citi analysts upgraded Boston Beer (NYSE:SAM) to Buy while downgrading Constellation Brands (NYSE:STZ) to Neutral in separate notes Thursday, citing diverging topline growth trends and external risks.
